name: Chicken Farm - My Tiny Tractor Racing Game For Kids
name_original: Chicken Farm - My Tiny Tractor Racing Game For Kids
description:
Chicken delivery! The cock-a-doodle doos. are on their way to be delivered. Help Old McDonald get his chickens by using his trucks to transport the chickens.

There are 3 trucks to choose from! Choose your favourite color for the truck and use it to pick and deliver the chickens. Carry as many chickens as you can and make Old McDonald happy! This game is very easy and simple yet addictive! So what are you waiting for? Download now!

Game Features
> Addictive game
> Game for kids who love animals
> Cool and fantastic game!
